{"step_by_step_thinking": "The facial nerve controls the muscles of facial expression, not the muscles involved in swallowing or tongue thrusting. Swallowing and tongue thrusting are complex actions that involve several muscles and nerves, primarily the glossopharyngeal nerve and the vagus nerve.
